readme:
### Signal Processing Speech to Text using CNNs

This is an old project that was used as a base for a notetaking implementation using speech to text. This model was too small and took too long to train with the resources I had. Ended up using pretrained models because this was so bad lol. But it was a good learning experience to learn a bit of signal processing and how to use CNNs for speech to text.

2025 update: Honestly, I don't remember much about this project. Just putting it on github for the sake of it.
title: notetaking-from-scratch
